pkgmetadata.longdescription: # statute-utils![Github CI](https://github.com/justmars/statute-utils/actions/workflows/main.yml/badge.svg)Philippine statutory law pattern matching and unit retrieval; utilized in [LawSQL dataset](https://lawsql.com).## DocumentationSee [documentation](https://justmars.github.io/statute-utils).## DevelopmentCheckout code, create a new virtual environment:```shpoetry add statute-utils # python -m pip install statute-utilspoetry update # install dependenciespoetry shell```## Some unit patterns```json title="Convention used when desiring to exclude appropriation laws."{ "units": [ { "item": "Container 1", "content": "Appropriation laws are excluded.", } ]}``````json title="Convention used when no content found."UNITS_NONE = [ { "item": "Container 1", "content": "Individual provisions not detected.", }]```
